summary: This mod change the textures of mountains and rocks from grayish to brownish color.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://s13.postimage.org/8xld91paf/copertina.jpg[/img]

In real life, mountains are brown as below:
[img]http://s14.postimage.org/4x5rrzy1t/image.jpg[/img]

Why in Skyrim are gray?
[/center]

This mod change the textures of mountains and rocks from grayish to brownish color.

* INSTALL *

You can use the ESP+BSA or the Loose Files version. Just choose one.

* TROUBLESHOOTING *

If you have textures with random colors instead of brownish mountains and rocks, please download the files in \"mirrors section\" instead of main files.

[center]

[youtube]EKW7-vCszlE[/youtube][youtube]PJXmWsCKrz0[/youtube][youtube]KpAOFqr0IM8[/youtube][youtube]F4bsBK85Nkg[/youtube]
[youtube]8r1csmaPSDM[/youtube][youtube]IUHyBhKTs7M[/youtube]

[img]http://s17.postimage.org/o6h6bv5zz/image.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s11.postimage.org/g9eyk6eo3/2012_09_09_00018_0000_2012_09_09_00024.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s16.postimage.org/543roqel1/2012_09_09_00018_0001_2012_09_09_00023.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s13.postimage.org/pvh639o3r/2012_09_09_00018_0002_2012_09_09_00022.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s8.postimage.org/h4abpdm5x/image.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s16.postimage.org/8y6epdaol/2012_09_09_00018_0003_2012_09_09_00020.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s14.postimage.org/6iyrvjnvl/2012_09_09_00018_0004_2012_09_09_00019.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s16.postimage.org/dlcgr4y1h/2012_09_09_00018_0005_Sfondo.jpg[/img]

and of course... The HD Version (with normal maps too)

[img]http://s13.postimage.org/fdaku1phj/Screen_Shot213.jpg[/img]
[/center]

Enjoy
author: MannyGT
